name: Rocks in Space (Agge) (Agge)
description:
Rocks in Space

~ Build your colony & manage your supply chains in an asteroid field
where resources are limited & everything is breakable ~

~ Establish a new colony in space ~ Dig for resources & grow your colony ~ Expand into the asteroid field & manage your supply chains

~~~ Thanks for reading this far. If you play the demo and get through the ~30min of gameplay, I would be really happy if you could leave short comment with feedback! ~~~
